pink primrose: Delicate pink flowers with four heart-shaped petals
hard-leaved pocket orchid: Orchid with thick leaves and pouch-like blooms
sweet pea: Fragrant climbing plant with butterfly-shaped blooms
english marigold: Bright orange-yellow flowers with layered petals
tiger lily: Orange flowers with dark spots and recurved petals
moon orchid: Large white tropical orchid with waxy texture
bird of paradise: Exotic orange-blue flower resembling tropical bird
monkshood: Tall spikes of hood-shaped purple flowers
globe thistle: Metallic blue spherical flower heads with spiky bracts
snapdragon: Tower of colorful flowers with dragon-mouth shaped blooms
colt's foot: Early spring yellow composite flowers before leaves
king protea: Large South African flower with fuzzy central dome
spear thistle: Purple prickly flower with spiny leaves and stem
yellow iris: Bright yellow flowers with three drooping petals
purple coneflower: Daisy-like flower with raised spiky center cone
peruvian lily: Clustered trumpet-shaped flowers with speckled throats
balloon flower: Bud forms balloon shape before opening into star-shaped bloom
giant white arum lily: Large white spathe surrounding yellow spadix
fire lily: Brilliant red-orange flowers with black-speckled centers
pincushion flower: Round flower head with protruding stamens like pins
red ginger: Tropical plant with cone-shaped red flower spikes
grape hyacinth: Dense clusters of small purple bell-shaped flowers
corn poppy: Bright red papery petals with black center
prince of wales feathers: Plume-like flower spikes in feathery arrangement
artichoke: Edible thistle with purple flower head
sweet william: Clustered small flowers with bicolor patterns
carnation: Ruffled fragrant flowers with serrated petals
garden phlox: Fragrant dome-shaped clusters of five-petaled flowers
love in the mist: Delicate blue flowers surrounded by lacy bracts
mexican aster: Daisy-like flowers with yellow centers and colorful rays
alpine sea holly: Steel-blue thistle-like flowers with spiky collar
ruby-lipped cattleya: Orchid with showy petals and vivid lip color
cape flower: South African bloom with unique geometrical petal arrangement
great masterwort: Umbels of small white flowers with pink tinge
siam tulip: Tropical plant with crepe-paper-like pink blooms
lenten rose: Early spring flowers with cup-shaped nodding blooms
barbeton daisy: African daisy with vibrant orange-yellow petals
daffodil: Trumpet-shaped central corona surrounded by six petals
poinsettia: Red leaf bracts surrounding small yellow flowers
bolero deep blue: Vibrant blue-violet flowers with white centers
wallflower: Fragrant four-petaled flowers in warm tones
marigold: Compact yellow-orange flowers with layered petals
oxeye daisy: White petals around prominent yellow disk
common dandelion: Bright yellow composite flower turning to puffball
wild pansy: Three-colored heart-shaped petals with dark markings
primula: Clustered flowers with yellow eye at center
sunflower: Large yellow ray flowers circling brown central disk
pelargonium: Zonal flowers with asymmetrical petal arrangement
bishop of llandaff: Dahlia variety with scarlet petals and dark foliage
gaura: Delicate white-pink flowers on wand-like stems
orange dahlia: Geometric orange flower heads with layered petals
pink-yellow dahlia: Bi-colored decorative blooms with pointed petals
japanese anemone: Simple cup-shaped flowers with prominent stamens
black-eyed susan: Golden-yellow daisies with dark brown centers
silverbush: Shrub with silvery leaves and white trumpet flowers
californian poppy: Cup-shaped orange flowers with silvery foliage
spring crocus: Early blooming cup-shaped purple or white flowers
bearded iris: Flowers with three upright standards and three drooping falls
windflower: Delicate poppy-like flowers with black centers
gazania: Daisy-like flowers with striking color patterns
azalea: Showy funnel-shaped flowers in dense clusters
water lily: Floating circular blooms with many layered petals
rose: Classic fragrant flower with layered petals and thorns
thorn apple: Trumpet-shaped white flowers with spiny fruit
morning glory: Vining plant with funnel-shaped blue flowers
lotus: Aquatic plant with large pink blooms and circular leaves
toad lily: Orchid-like spotted flowers on arching stems
anthurium: Waxy red spathe with protruding spadix
frangipani: Tropical flowers with five-petal pinwheel shape
hibiscus: Tropical flowers with prominent central stamens
columbine: Unique spurred flowers in various colors
magnolia: Large fragrant cup-shaped flowers before leaves
hippeastrum: Large trumpet-shaped flowers on tall stalks
bee balm: Tubular flowers in dense whorls, attracting pollinators
ball moss: Air plant with small green flowers (not true moss)
foxglove: Tall spikes of tubular spotted flowers
bougainvillea: Vibrant papery bracts surrounding tiny white flowers
camellia: Waxy symmetrical flowers with many petals
mexican petunia: Purple trumpet-shaped flowers with striped throats
bromelia: Tropical plant with colorful bract and small flowers
trumpet creeper: Orange-red tubular flowers attractive to hummingbirds
blackberry lily: Spotted orange flowers with blackberry-like seed clusters
